# Slick
## Overview
**Slick:** Add +10 to the DC of any [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] check made to scale the chosen side of the wall. When creating this augmentation, you may choose for it to affect only one side of a wall.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Grease (Spell)|grease]]; Market Price:* 1,500 gp.
